駏駏駏

駏字的基本解释

駏
jù
〔駏驉（
x?）〕古书上说的一种形似骡，可供乘骑的兽：“恒从小奚奴骑駏駏。”

駏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jù］
［《廣韻》其吕切，上語，羣。］
駏驉。

駏字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駏； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1435第44
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?臼許切，音巨。【玉篇】駏驉，獸似騾。【古今注】騾爲牝馬爲牡生駏。【唐書·李賀傳】從小奚奴騎駏驉。【註】似驘而小。【韻會】通作距。　又獸名。【韓愈詩】終始如駏蛩。【註】孔叢子，北方有獸名蟨，食得甘草，必齧以遺蛩蛩駏虛。二獸見人來，必負蟨以走。二獸非愛蟨也，爲其得甘草以遺之。蟨非愛獸也，爲其假足也。

駏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
駏字的起名意思

暂无。

Gou
Basic explanation of words
Gou
jù
〔駏驉(
x?)] The ancient book said that a beast that resembles a mule and can be ridden on: "Heng Congzi slaves ride a horse."
Gou
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jù］
["Guangyun" Qi Lu Qi, Shangyu, group. ]
駏驉.
Gou
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駏; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1435-44
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Jiu Xuqi, the sound is huge. 【Jade articles】The beast is like a mule. [Ancient and Modern Note] The mule is the mausoleum and the mule. [Tang Shu·Li He Biography] Since childhood, Xi slaves rode Xuan Xuan. 【Note】Similar but small. 【Rhyme】Through the distance.　Also the animal name. [Han Yushi] The beginning is like a cricket. [Note] Kong Congzi, there is an animal name in the north, who eats licorice, must bite it to the left cricket. When the two beasts see people coming, they must bear the burden to walk away. The two beasts are not lovers, and they are left behind for obtaining licorice. He is not a beast lover, but a prosthetic foot.
Gou
